{"id":294287928,"lang":"python3","time":"1 year, 6 months","timestamp":1579054007,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"24 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/294287928/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Regular Expression Matching","memory":"12.7 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def isMatch(self, s: str, p: str) -> bool:\n        rows = 1 + len(s)\n        cols = 1 + len(p)\n        arr = [[False for i in range(cols)] for j in range(rows)]\n        arr[0][0] = True\n\n        i = 1\n        while i < cols:\n            if i < cols-1 and p[i] == '*':\n                i = i + 1\n                for j in range(rows):\n                    if arr[j][i-2]:\n                        arr[j][i] = True\n                    elif j > 0 and arr[j-1][i] and (p[i-2] == '.' or p[i-2] == s[j-1]):\n                        arr[j][i] = True\n                i = i + 1\n            else:\n                for j in range(rows):\n                    if j > 0 and arr[j-1][i-1] and (p[i-1] == '.' or p[i-1] == s[j-1]):\n                        arr[j][i] = True\n                i = i + 1\n        \n        return arr[rows-1][cols-1]","compare_result":"","title_slug":"regular-expression-matching"}
